name: Hobgoblin

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage  or 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  range 150/600 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Formation Movement
special_abilities.desc: If the hobgoblin begins its turn within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated, its movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
